Instruction: Heat a heavy flat griddle or skillet over medium to low heat.
In a bowl, combine flour, salt, and baking soda, then create a well in the center of the dry ingredients. Pour in the buttermilk to mix.
Knead lightly on a floured surface, shape into a round, flatten, and cut with a floured knife before baking on a griddle or skillet.
Cook the farls on the hot, floured pan for approximately 6 to 8 minutes on each side or until they turn golden brown.
